about_me: I'm Madushan Joel, a passionate and dedicated software engineer with a deep love for solving complex problems through technology. I have a strong foundation in software engineering, with a BTEC HND and a BSc Honours in Computer Science, both of which I completed with first-class honors. My journey has been defined by continuous learning, curiosity, and the drive to stay on top of the latest trends in the tech industry. Currently, I’m working at People’s Leasing and Finance Sri Lanka, utilizing Java Spring Boot and other cutting-edge technologies to deliver innovative solutions. I enjoy taking on new challenges, whether it’s building apps, contributing to open-source projects. My ultimate goal is to make an impact through the projects I create and the knowledge I share, always aiming for growth and excellence.

expriance.des: I started my career as a software developer(2023) & promoted as an Senior Software Developer  specialize in developing Restful APIs , Web application using Java's Spring Boot framework for both mobile and web applications. Additionally, I am responsible for maintaining and debugging the backend code for mobile app variants of the core system. This includes ensuring smooth performance and addressing any issues that may arise.

projects.name: PLC Lead Management System
projects.description: The Lead Management System (LMS) is a dynamic platform designed to streamline lead generation, tracking, and conversion across multiple branches. It enables campaigns at branch, regional, and national levels, allowing seamless collaboration between marketing teams. Leads are sourced from various channels, including digital platforms, promotions, call centers, car sales, walk-ins, and telephone inquiries, and are directed to a centralized branch interface for efficient processing.

projects.name: PLC Touch App
projects.description: Developing and maintaining PLC Touch App's REST service backend using Spring Boot. About PLC Touch App: https://www.plc.lk/plc-touch/

projects.name: PLC CAAP Mobile Application
projects.description: Developing and maintaining the Spring Boot backend of the application.

projects.name: PLC CAPP App
projects.description: CAPP will help to provide credit facilities with an online approval via a seamless process, improving customer turnaround times.

projects.name: LEMS and PLC Transaction REST Service
projects.description: Enables Eco Three Wheeler Savings Account holders to use any battery swap station by inserting the battery and entering their unique ID. The battery station requests PLC to confirm the account balance.

projects.name: Transaction Classification Model
projects.description: A machine learning model designed to categorize financial transactions based on text descriptions into predefined categories (e.g., 'Debit' or 'Credit'). Utilizes text data from transaction descriptions to predict transaction types.

projects.name: People's Travel Insurance
projects.description: Converted a static product to dynamic using a Java servlet project.

projects.name: FireInsurance API Service for People's Bank
projects.description: Developed a RESTful service for People's Bank to retrieve client information and generate policy issue numbers for People's Insurance.

projects.name: Fixed Assets Management System
projects.description: Developed as an Individual Final Project to streamline asset tracking and procurement efficiency. Features include price comparison, QR scanning integration via Flutter, and a MySQL database with JPA mapping. Built with Spring Boot MVC architecture for optimal performance, scalability, and maintainability.

projects.name: Board Writer
projects.description: Developed an application using Spring Boot to efficiently generate and manage board paper numbers/tokens, ensuring timely access and accountability.

projects.name: Save Wild Web & Mobile App
projects.description: Led the development of a Wildlife Crimes Reporting Application comprising a web platform with an admin panel and a public portal, along with a mobile application. Utilized Spring Boot for the web interface and Flutter for mobile compatibility, enabling real-time incident tracking and cross-platform accessibility.

projects.name: People's Leasing and Finance Core System
projects.description: Developed and maintained various components including CRIB credit score, CRIB view on client applications, fixed assets, and inventory management.

projects.name: E Revenue Licence Automation for People's Insurance
projects.description: Automated the saving and updating of existing vehicle e-Revenue licenses every 5 minutes using Spring Boot and Progress 4GL. Tasks included integrating ERL API (access token management, error handling), proxy server configuration, and scheduler configurations to fetch and update data from the database.

projects.name: CRIB API Integration
projects.description: Built an intermediary layer to interact with the CRIB third-party API and expose a custom REST API. This integration included automated token handling, proxy server merging, and error handling. Utilized in both the CAPP app and PLC Core System.

projects.name: Student Management System
projects.description: Individual project: Developed a web-based Student Management System using Java Web Servlet, JSP, and MySQL JDBC.

projects.name: Metal Detector Android App
projects.description: Developed an Android app using the device's built-in magnetometer to detect ferrous metals and visualize the magnetic field.

projects.name: Hospital Management System
projects.description: Developed a Hospital Management System using PHP and MySQL for ESOFT's Pearson BTECH HND program.

projects.name: URL Shortening Service
projects.description: Created a URL Shortening Service using the Spring Boot framework and MySQL JDBC.

onlive.name: Bramuda Transaction Classification
onlive.description: Introducing our Transaction Classification Model—a powerful tool that automatically categorizes financial transactions as either Credit or Debit based on their descriptions. Leveraging advanced Natural Language Processing techniques like TF-IDF for feature extraction and Logistic Regression for classification, this model streamlines accounting by reducing manual errors and providing real-time insights into financial data. Developed by Madushan Joel, it's designed for banks, financial institutions, and businesses looking to simplify their financial operations.

onlive.name: ToolSpark
onlive.description: Explore ToolSpark versatile online tools, including a WhatsApp Chat Viewer for exported chats, Base64 encoder/decoder,QR genrator Morse code translator, and more. Fast, secure, and user-friendly utilities for your daily needs

onlive.name: Ottasker
onlive.description: Ottasker Flask Template is a well-structured, open-source Flask boilerplate designed to streamline and accelerate web application development with a focus on clean architecture and maintainability. It provides an organized project structure, seamless blueprint management, and clearly defined request and response models to standardize API behavior. Application configurations are easily managed through intuitive JSON files, allowing for efficient customization. Ottasker comes equipped with built-in support for JWT-based authentication, CORS settings, and robust logging management, making it ideal for both small-scale projects and scalable systems. Whether you're prototyping or building a production-grade app, Ottasker offers a reliable foundation for developing clean and modular Flask applications.
